problem.markdown:
>>Which version of Excel was the Excel Data Model FIRST introduced??<<
( ) Excel 2007 (x) Excel 2010 ( ) Excel 2013 ( ) Excel 2016
[explanation] Excel data model is first introduced in Excel 2010. [explanation]
problem.p: Which version of Excel was the Excel Data Model FIRST introduced??

choicegroup.label: Which version of Excel was the Excel Data Model FIRST introduced??

div.p: Excel data model is first introduced in Excel 2010.
